channel.title: CVE Feed for Libsyn -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Libsyn -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-25057|2024-08-02T11:11:43.621Z -- libsyn -- libsyn%20publisher%20hub
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Libsyn Libsyn Publisher Hub.This issue affects Libsyn Publisher Hub: from n/a through 1.3.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-32140|2024-07-12T16:39:06.386Z -- libsyn -- libsyn%20publisher%20hub
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Libsyn Libsyn Publisher Hub allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Libsyn Publisher Hub: from n/a through 1.4.4.
